page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart mapped dimension object
page.description: The parameters of a mapped dimension.

property.name: as
property.description: The type of data in the dimension.

property.name: discrete
property.description: If true then the dimension is discrete.

property.name: constrained
property.description: If dimension is discrete and then value is true then the dimension is used to constrain the other dimensions.

property.name: values
property.description: If dimension is discrete then the discrete values will be stored in this array.

property.name: base
property.description: For continuous dimensions, the base value of the dimension. The default will be "0".

property.name: min
property.description: For continuous dimensions, the minimum value of the dimension.

property.name: max
property.description: For continuous dimensions, the maximum value of the dimension.
